front.title: American National Standard Requirements for Combustion Gas Turbine Driven Cylindrical Rotor Synchronous Generators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Requirements are provided for 60-Hz open-ventilated air-cooled cylindrical-rotor synchronous generators rated 10,000 kVA and above. Classification, service conditions, output rating and capabilities, temperature, abnormal and short-circuit requirements, efficiency, overspeed, telephone influence factor, tests, direction of rotation, and nameplate marking are covered. A performance specification form is shown.
